EmailTemplate.name: 05-18-21 BNK PFDFW Phase 2 Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how NCR and Google are working together to harness the power of cloud and transform banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly: NCR’s partnership with Google Cloud is all about making it easier for your FI to bring new banking services to market and accelerate your transformation. Together, NCR and Google are expanding cloud deployment and innovating cloud-based solutions with data and analytics. Register to join NCR at the Google Cloud Financial Service Summit on May 27, where you can access the on-demand presentation from NCR executives discussing how to build the right plan and find the right partner for your digital-first journey. ${CTAText3} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> ${CTA2Text4} <[[${CTA2URL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
